channel.title: Steven Moffat on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Steven Moffat on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Political Drama ‘Number 10’ On Its Way From ‘Sherlock’ Creator Steven Moffat and Channel 4 (Exclusive)
item.description: “The government will be fictional, but the problems will be real,” reads a plot synopsis for Moffat’s new show, set inside the British prime minister’s official residence.
